content.detailedDescription: There were two of them the first one had 12 round lights and the other one only had 8 lights they are very hard to explain but could draw out a clear picture they were easy to see as they hovered for about 5 minuts then all you could see was white line and they were gone.
content.summary: Was there for maybe 5 mins then was gone in blink of eye

content.detailedDescription: This happened almost 15 years ago.  i never knew what to make of it but it haunts me so much now that i think it needs to be reported.  in july of 2000, 17th at approximately 11 pm.  i took a ride from peoria, il to bethalto, il with two people who headed that way and happened to be friends of my friend [name removed/dr/cms].   the driver was a male nicknamed "happy" in his early 20's and his girlfriend whom i knew only her name [name removed/dr/cms].  they wanted to go to a "rave" party that weekend in st. louis and when they heard i was part of a promotion group that threw these sort of parties, they wanted me to guide them and get them into the party in exchange for a ride to my fiance in bethalto,il.  we made it to bethalto by around 10 pm and my fiance was asleep and refused to come along.  i jumped back into happys car and having very little knowledge of the roads to st. louis, i tried to navigate.  mind you this was 2000, i had no gps. we took 55 and went the wrong direction.  the driver insisted he knew better than i where to go and eventually we wound up on sorento ave. in the middle of freaking nowhere.  we were driving in a dark country road with no light really.  i was looking out the window at a farmhouse that was illuminated by a bright light. having grown up in the country, i figured at first that the light was a stadium or street light that farmers sometimes have so they can see at night when putting away the tractors, etc.   but then my brain clicked and i realized this light was way too high.  my next assumption was it was a helicopter, so i rolled my window down to see if i could hear.  it was stupid considering the car was moving and the farmhouse and light were about 1/2 mile or more away from me. at this point the other passengers asked me what was up. i told them and they too were intrigued. so happy stopped the car and turned it off and we all got out. we listened.  the light made no noise, it stayed put right over the house.  i also noticed that in the middle of nowhere in the middle of hot summer in july, i heard no bugs, no crickets or frogs etc.  it was weird.  we all stared for a long time and then it broke from its position and started towards us.  we all panicked and got back in the car and took off down the road at a high rate of speed, the light was still high up but now trailing us about 1/4 mile behind the car.  we came up to a "t" in the road.  i told happy to go right. we turned on a road called red ball trail. the light was still following us. we came up to another "t" in the road and what was alarming was it was identical to the road we came upon last time, i looked at the sign and it said we were about to turn on red ball trail again...But we already did that. it was the same damn intersection!  so i told happy to turn right again.  the light was still following us and we came upon the t again.  the same t intersection, again.  same road signs, same everything.  we were hysterical at this point.  his girlfriend said go left happy made another left. the light was finally gone.  finally, we started seeing things that were different and ended up in coffeen il.  we got back on the interstate, happy dumped me off at my fiances and they refused to come in or stay the night.  they were scared out their minds.  i was confused.  the other day, now in my 30's, i tell the tale to my husband (he was fiance back then) and i wonder, did we get caught up in a time jump or something? i got the distinct feeling that whatever it was, was not actually trying to "get"us.. i think we were on the same path as its exit and somehow got caught up in something i cant explain.
content.summary: Light over farm house that then gave chase.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were motor cycling riding at hungry valley, gorman ca, where we stop to look at the view at the top of condor mesa, at the very end of the cul-de-sac. we walked out to the edge of the bluff and took several pictures of the area, including a sequence of shots of a black crow flying overhead. our position at this point is facing east.

we heard no sounds, saw nothing with the visible eye, or was aware of any ufo presence. 

i only discovered the picture of the ufo as i was going through the sequence of the images i shot yesterday and noticed a tiny object to the upper left of the crow. 

i have included the picture 1540 which is the first shot, and the immediately after, the second shot 1541 contains the ufo in the upper left quadrant.
content.summary: I was photographing a black crow and took a series of pictures, 1 of which contains the ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Opowiem po kolei.

wyszed³em na nockê by postawiæ ¶wieczkê na 4 kamiennych p³ytach w ¶rodku lasu niedaleko jeziora torfy. gdy doszed³em na miejsce i mia³em przej¶æ przez ma³y przesmyk z wod± nagle zgas³a mi latarka i ni cho**ry nie chcia³a siê w³±czyæ. kucn±³em instynktownie, wyj±³em sztylet i nas³uchiwa³em... nic, ¿adnego szmeru. wiedzia³em, ¿e go¶æ jest w pobli¿u, i choæ bêd±c w tej ciemnicy, nic nie widzia³em, to wiedzia³em gdzie jest. sk±d? nie wiem. telepatia? przeczucie? no nie wiem. wiedzia³em jedno, by³ na lewo od mojej pozycji, po drugiej stronie jeziora. ja na prawo, on na lewo. paradox :)
(tu muszê powiedzieæ, ¿e 2-3 dni wcze¶niej widzia³em go w tym samym miejscu, ale nieco dalej, jak przeskakiwa³ z ulicy w jar i gna³ na ³eb na szyjê w zaro¶la. by³ ubrany ca³y na czarno. by³a ciep³a s³oneczna pogoda).
siedz±c tak w kucki i nas³uchuj±c pomy¶la³em w pewnym momencie, ¿e go¶æ musia³ strzeliæ z jakiej¶ formy broni energetycznej, bo latarka permanentnie przesta³a dzia³aæ. 
chcia³em doj¶æ na miejsce, mia³em ze 3 metry do p³yt ale w taj ciemnicy nic nie widzia³em. szybko zerkn±³em na niebo, "no tak to nie ten dzieñ na pe³niê" pomy¶la³em i przekln±³em pod nosem. pomy¶la³em, ¿e zrobiê pochodniê. spróbowa³em z w³asnych skarpetek i kawa³ka kijka, nawet j± zapali³em, ale su*a nie chcia³a siê tliæ. poduma³em chwilkê i olawszy p³yty, odchodz±c od nich, nagle przypomnia³em sobie ¿e mam komórkê. wyj±³em j± i o¶wietlaj±c sobie monitorkiem jej ¶wiat³a ¶cie¿kê, poszed³em do domu.
gdy ju¿ doszed³em pod dom otworzy³em po cichu drzwi i równie¿ po cichu postanowi³em i¶æ spaæ, po wszystkich nocnych czynno¶ciach oczywi¶cie ;)
nastêpnego dnia po ¶niadaniu w³o¿y³em do latarki nowe baterie i zapali³em j±. nic. zamieni³em ¿aróweczki. nic. obejrza³em latarkê dok³adnie i zobaczy³em nadpalon± ma³± kropeczkê. w mig zrozumia³em. ukrad³ energiê latarce. nie tyle z baterii co samemu plastikowi i kwarcowi z ¿arówki. dos³ownie energiê aury. wyrzuci³em latarkê do kosza. po co niedzia³aj±cy mi ¶mieæ pomy¶la³em. dzi¶ wiem, ¿e zrobi³em b³±d, bo mia³bym dowód, a tak nie mam nic. 
dopiero niedawno przeczyta³em artyku³ o energii fulerenów. a teraz zrozumia³em to: fuleren= energiê bionu (amebicznych ¿yj±tek w orgonie), w powietrzu= aura= ogieñ= plazma= kosmos= dusza.
content.summary: Human being experienced human like being in forest. flashlight were broken by unknown gun emitter and trashed.

content.detailedDescription: mine is different then most.   i was watching t.V. and a strong light attracted my attention, i looked outside and saw 3 perfectly formed mean faces.  i was in disbelief as i watched these faces for about an hour.    since then, i noticed many odd accurences, such as strange small hole in my scalp, than never heals.  my health seemed to take a turn for the worse at this point.  through the last 18 years i have had many strange accurances.
content.summary: Bright light,  then 3 faces observed.

content.detailedDescription: While flying from minneapolis to fort myers aboard a delta plane on sunday december 14 2014 between 11:00a.M. and 12:00p.M there was a heavy cloud cover below i am not sure what state we were over either south eastern georgia or the pan handle of florida  i noticed what looked like a flock of geese flying in formation realizing geese do not fly that high i starting watching this formation as it approached like floating it looked like a clear rectangular plastic box with what looked like burlap sacks hanging in it  after a few minutes it started a slow turn west i believe. even though i could see through it the inside and outside corners i could make out  having never heard of a clear rectangle u f o i just wondered if anyone else reported it or if you have seen anything like it.  that you for any information in this matter
content.summary: While flying from minneapolis to fort myers i observed a rectangular object that looked transparent with brown objects inside

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I was on my dock looking up at the stars and i saw what looked like to be a chunk of the dark star lit sky move, then that part became dull like the stars on that small chunk of the sky melted away and then i saw the chunk of sky became more visible as a disk/oval shape start to like move to the right very smoothly then stop and lower and then just hover several hundereds of feet above the canal and went closer to the house im staying in but at the same time it moved up in an arching shape and then just as it started to move up the lite blue light on the side flashed twice and then it moved really fast up and then seemed to become part of the sky again. i have no other way to describe it other than that, it seriously like it blurred back into the sky i cant explain it better than that. when the thing lowered a little bit as it was several hundreds of feet above the water i could see the edges look like it was wobbling/melting or vibrating i dont know. like looking at the road on a hot day and seeing those waving patterns. when it started to just hover and move slowy back up i got this sharp pain in my jaw and ears that sounded like a dog whistle and my head felt extremely pressured. im honestly scared i dont know what to do. this feeling happened before it flashed. after it flashed all those feeling subsided.


please email me im really scared about this i have never witnessed this before, i feel like im losing my mind over it. i have no other explanations so im sending this in. please email me some answers asap please: [email removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Graphite in color of surface but also like a chrome color, flashed blue lights twice, seemed to melt around the edges and lowered and became solid again?

content.detailedDescription: I walked down to the old piers at perkins beach on lake erie one night. it was a clear, warm night. i arrived around 11:30pm and sat there listening to my mp3 player and looking at the stars. around 2am, something caught my eye in the direction of downtown, about 40 degrees northeast of my position and about a mile out on the water. i judge the distance by the light of the water intake plant which was directly to my north and 3 miles out. what i saw was a blue orb spinning counter clockwise. it spun very fast a couple times and then another came off of it. the first one stopped spinning and the second one spun very fast a couple times counter clockwise at which time another came off of the second one. the second one stopped spinning and the third spun very fast a couple times counter clockwise. then all three started spinning in all different directions going all over the place. it reminded me of baby animals running around playing. i sat there and watched for a minute then tried to make contact. the light on my mp3 player was the same color so i put out an sos in morse code a couple times. well, they saw it. the one on the left spun very fast clockwise into the middle one, the middle one spun clockwise into the one on the right, the one on the right spun clockwise a couple times a then disappeared. by the time i could think to myself "what the hell was that", a big white light 25 to 30 feet long and brighter than anything i've ever seen popped on in the water at the edge of the pier about 60 feet away. the light lit up the entire beach and temporarily blinded me. there was no noise whatsoever. all i could do was drop to a knee and try to look at this thing while trying to block out the light. i was terrified. i didn't know what this thing was going to do. i wretch down and unfastened the sheath for my tactical bowie knife on my belt and was about to pull it out but something told me not to do that and not to provoke it.  it just stayed on me for a couple minutes which felt like an eternity until i had the idea to show it the light on my mp3 player. i flashed the light a couple times and within 15 seconds the light shut off and it was gone. i got up frantically looking to see where it went but there was no trace. i walked a little further down the beach and took cover behind a group of trees to wait it out and see if any park rangers saw the light and within 10 minutes i look over and see one come out of the woods with his flashlight on right at pier 4 where it happened at. i watched him stand there panning his flashlight around looking hard and scratching his head like he knew he saw something. i didn't go talk to him on account that i wasn't supposed to be down there at that time. all i know is that there's no way i was the only one to see it that night. it was too bright and in clear view of downtown, route 2 and edgewater. it was probably caught on the crib cam along with other cameras downtown facing the lake.
content.summary: Blue orbs on lake erie

content.detailedDescription: Have to say my girlfriend was the one to spot the object as she was out side smoking she notice the bright lights coming towards the house looking real bright as it was heading west and my home is 3 miles west of goodland kansas on hwy i was amazed to see another sighting .I brought out my phone started to take pictures as the seconds just timed out as i was trying to get it on video only to full so i took the pictures about 9:00-9:30 pm we were on our way to bed. this light looked crazy as the others had rome threw this small town of goodland kansas.. during the 2 election of obama again my girl was out at 10:00 pm smoking as she caught view of flashing lights and there were 8 witnessed the craft. no noise i have it on video about 300 to 400 ft away was awesome we called a law enforcement to view our video he was shocked to see what little we had caught to our file.. i have pictures n still to this day wonder if there is something there and i have bad eye sight so it's day time when i took these pictures.. [phone number removed/cms/tg] [names removed/cms/tg] please let me know if i sent one that are the same so i know which i've sent
content.summary: Was heading west as it moved slowly like trying to decide which way to go then it headed south east..Crazy shit but it's not the first around here in goodland kansas..

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the diridon transit station in san jose, california waiting for my train on my way to work.  i decided to take pictures of some cherry blossoms with my cell phone.  i have a samsung galaxy s5 - it's a very good camera.  i take two pictures; one at 12:13 pm and one at 12:14 pm.  i then notice a security mirror on a pole that has a cool reflection of the cherry trees and rail tracks so i decide to photograph the mirror as well.  i take one photograph at 12:14 pm, reposition myself and take another picture of the mirror at 12:15 pm.  all photographs are time-stamped.  i then go sit down in the shade to review my pictures and continue to wait for the train.


i notice in the picture taken at 12:15 pm that there's a white object above the lamp post in the foreground of the picture (direction of the photo is roughly sw).  it is not in the similar picture take one minute prior.  not sure what it is, i zoom in on it and am astonished to find that it looks like a saucer or half-circle shaped object surrounded by a light or vapor emission.  i'm convinced i captured an image of a ufo.  the next morning i decide to scrutinize my photos from then to see if i can see anything else.  in the two photos of the cherry blossoms (taken at 12:13 and 12:14, direction is roughly se) i can see disc-shaped objects and light streaks in the sky when i zoom in.  i am not an expert on these things but the objects i've captured in my photos are suspiciously 'unidentified.'  there are planes in the area as the transit station is not far from the airport but i have definitely not captured any images of airplanes.

attached is the fourth photo, the most conclusive one, showing the white object above the lamp post that, when zoomed in, resembles a spacecraft.  i can send the other two if requested.  those require more explanation of location, zooming, etc.
content.summary: White object shows up in the sky in a photograph - zoomed in looks like a spacecraft

content.detailedDescription: I was on my roof recording objects in the night sky.  i noticed something bright out of my peripheral vision.  i then got my camera up and got it in frame as soon as i could.  i tracked it for about a minute.  i have submitted the video to youtube.  here is the link: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright orb moving across my field of view, then changed direction and vanished.

content.detailedDescription: It was a couple days before my 18th birthday. all day something in my head kept telling me i need to go for a drive that night. so around 7, my friend, my girlfriend and i went for a drive. my friend asked where to and the same voice from earlier told me the metroparks. we drove around the metroparks for about an hour until clear as day i heard this is the spot. i told my friend to pull over and we sat there outside the car listening to the radio for about 20 minutes still wondering what we were doing here. i looked up toward the treeline and saw something big flying real slow just above the trees. i pointed and asked my friend if he sees what i'm seeing and as soon as i did, the radio shut off. my girlfriend freaked out, jumped in the drivers seat and frantically tried to start the car but it wouldn't start. i've heard of this happening but was astonished that it was actually true. i told her it wasn't going to start and to just relax. another car was driving down the road as the object came closer and that car stalled out also. the object was a black triangle with a white light on each corner of the bottom with a larger white light in the middle. looked a lot like the black triangle from belgium in 89 but this one was bigger. it flew in at a slow crawl. i was able to walk faster. it was as long as a football field and about 3 storys tall. it looked all black until the moon light hit it and then i could see a metallic color. it also had a window on its right side toward the top that was about 20 foot long and 3 foot high that i could see light coming from. that freaked me out because if i could see in, then there was something on the inside that could look out.  as i walked up to it against my friends better judgement, i picked up a rock and threw it at the object. i think i hit it because it looked like some kind of forcefield came up around it. best way i can describe it is on a really hot day when you see the steam coming up off the road and you can see the air moving. it stopped and hovered. as i walked within 50 feet of it, i can hear it making a low pitch, pulsating hum which i could feel as a static electricity pulsating through my body. i yelled to my friend if they could hear it but they couldn't . i walked directly under it for a couple minutes in which time i had a conversation in my head that's still unclear. all i remember hearing at the end was their coming we have to go. it then rose back above the treeline and continued on its original path. a couple minutes later, a military jet flew over and a minute after that 2 more right next to each other at the same altitude and direction as the object. we jumped in the car, made sure we all saw the same thing and got out of there. the next morning i woke up confused and feeling funny. i put on the shirt from last night and realized i had a big pink blotch on the right shoulder of my blue shirt. nobody ever wanted to talk about what happened after that.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering overhead

content.detailedDescription:
On 8 march 2015 at about 5:15 pm, my son and i had just exited the aquarium in downtown toronto. minutes later i paused to photograph a group of new high rise condos (i'm a photographer and thought the buildings would make an interesting photo as they were well lit and the sky as far as i could see was cloudless and blue). i shot two photos of these condo buildings using my iphone 6 plus. i did not notice anything unusual at that time. later i made a copy of my favorite of those two photos and proceeded to retouch it and convert it to black and white to post on my flickr page. (it should be noted that i always keep the unaltered original photos as reference files.) when i looked at the retouched black and whit image on a larger screen, i noticed two distinct dots in the sky above the condos. i thought that i had perhaps over processed the copy and in doing so may have introduced some artifacts into the image. i referenced the two up retouched original images and noticed something i found odd.

in the first image, i saw (when zoomed in) that there were two objects, one triangular and another smaller and orb shaped. they appear to be lit or reflecting the sunlight in the same direction the condos were lit. they also seem to have a shadowed side behind them, also in keeping with the buildings. i checked the second image and noticed that the two objects were considerably lower in the sky than image one, plus there was now a third, saucer-shaped object very near them, also similarly lit.

i checked the exif data of the two photos and discovered that they had been taken six seconds apart. in that span of six seconds, the first two objects were much lower in the sky and had been "joined" by a third object.

as stated i did not observe this at the time of occurrence, nor can i offer any explanation as to just what they were. i would greatly appreciate any insights from your field investigators or photo experts. i have not yet found any reports of sightings over ontario on that date.

attached are the two original images, being directly uploaded from my phone's camera roll. for good measure i am including the retouched black and white image as well. i give my full permission for any mufon usage of these images, but would like to retain credit should they be used or posted publicly.
content.summary: 2 unidentifiable objects appeared in first photo, 3 objects appeared in second photo

content.detailedDescription: I was at my family's camp in clearfield county pa. on what they called the old krise farm area on caledonia pike and my dad said go out and see if you can walk up to a deer by blinding it with a flashlight which we successfuly have done one time so i walked out to the edge of the cut grass looking over a field and noticed a couple deer far away to the south but quickly noticed a large star that i first thought wow that's a pretty big star. it was a quarter of the size of the moon. while i was looking at it wondering what it was 2 small lights shot out of the right side of it and hovered stationary at the same level for a few seconds and then the large star shot straight up and a split second after the 2 small lights did the same and at lightning speed and disappeared. i was 16 years old at the time. i went in the camp and told my dad and grandparents what i saw and they laughed and said i was seeing things. i didn't want them to think i was crazy so i just dropped it.I never doubted what i saw but did not tell them how certain i was about what i saw. i don't know if there were any more sightings in this time period or location but after watching your program yesterday i thought this might be helpful. good luck in what you do and i am a fan. the time period is not exact. i only remember i was around 16 years old.                               sincerely,  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: One large starlike light and 2 small lights shot out to the right and then the big one shot straight up followed by the 2 small ones

content.detailedDescription: On february 28,2015 i came home for my lunch hour at 4 am not noticing anything different, i relaxed and had something to eat. after about 40 minutes i decided to head back to work. as i was locking my back door i happen to look up at the morning sky in the west and i saw three streaks of light.They varied in color and also in intensity. i thought to myself why would we have search lights in the sky at 4 am? i continued to look in eastern sky to see if there was anything there and there was also three streaks there too.This was starting to freak me out now.Then perused to look in the southern sky and there was a single streak in the sky.The lights didn't move or strobe, they just hung there in the morning sky.It was strange though because you couldn't see where the light source started from.I took out my cell phone and captured the lights from the west and south, the one i took in the east didn't show up.I had to get back to work, so i estimate the time i viewed this exciting sight was about 20 minutes.I'm just glad i was able to capture what i saw february 28,2015.
content.summary: Came out my back door and noticed these ray of lights in the western sky

content.detailedDescription:
2:55 pst in los angeles county, 03/30/2015. a clear night in my town 30 miles east of los angeles. i was out smoking when i observed two faint stars adjacent to one much brighter star. the two were moving relative the brighter; their direction was south to north. they stayed equidistant to one another in a continuous direction until i lost sight of the trailing light first, and then eventually the other went below the level of the san gabriel mountains.
their altitude exceeded the capability of man's inventions. i will estimate an altitude exceeding 100,000 feet msl. not half as fast as a meteor, but much faster than commercial and military flight operations. 
26 year airline transport pilot. we see these curious anomalies out over the deserts fairly regularly. but not in pairs like this event.
thank you
content.summary: Two faint star-like objects at an altitude exceeding commercial and military aviation, staying equidistant from each other at high speed.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I, mike, and my friend were walking up the hill towards my friends house after a late night walk down by the lake. as we were coming upon a spot in the road with a clear sky view we happened to look up and we clearly saw a bright multicolored object traveling across the sky. it had a sort of fiery comet trail, as if it could have been a meteorite. but those fall quickley, with this object took as near approximate 5-7 seconds to cross the clear patch of sky. it also should be noted that the object could have traveled quite a ways once it left our view. there was no sound from or caused by the object. from what i and my friend observed the object looked to be on a slight downward-arching descent to its flight pattern. we have not seen any similar sightings.
content.summary: Traveling uphill from late night walk, looked up and noticed ufo. no sound besides woodsy wildlife.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down for a nap, and i normally do that. as i was falling asleep i woke up and was paralyzed. i opened my eyes and saw a creature with grey-purple skin with a very defined jawline. i knew it was an alien creature, it was too real to be anything else or my imagination. it was hovering over my bedside, looking right at me, it blinked so then i did, and it looked like 3 of the same alien and they were working on a control panel like thing, and my brain seemed like the screen they were working on. i felt this tingling feeling on the back of my body like i was force holding myself almost like a rollercoaster kind of force. i lost memory and feeling after i saw them monitoring me.
content.summary: Sleep paralysis, scoop mark, monitoring my brain

content.detailedDescription: I sent a email before. multi color orb. had to report as i have never seen anything like it. 3 people saw it and 2 videos were taken. can provide if you wish. can't upload videos from my phone at this time. they are digital. had trouble getting cameras to work at first. having problems getting the rest of this form filled out as its not friendly with phone.
content.summary: Ball of multi colored light due west on florida clear sky. slightly above horizon

content.detailedDescription: Took my dog out to bathroom standing there noticed a huge pulsating light. it seemed to change shape. went inside got boyfriend who didn't have an explanation for it it was something weird he said. i got my cellphone outwhen ii saw it move then stop again. didn't know if they would come out but they did. it changed from bright star like. to pulsating reflectant, it's shape changed from round to disk to teardrop, cigar .  it wold move then stop and kept doing tjat for a long time watched it and took ics for about an hour. very exciting experience. i hope it is something you find interesting. of was very cold out and we went in to warm up. and after thirty mkn or so went back out n it was gone.
content.summary: Takeing dog out noticed pulsating ligjt that seemed to change shape n color. took pics with cellphone

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night 3/28/2015 at 9:33 pm i was standing outside in front of my house and i looked up at the sky as it was a clear night.I then saw a bright spherical light at the 12 o'clock position i first thought it was a satellite i noticed it was traveling from south to north in a straight line. at 11 o'clock position it suddenly got brighter and larger, at 10 o'clock position it dimmed back to its original size and brightness. a few seconds later it dimmed to a dot and then vanished.It was not a meteror or satellite as i see them often.It made no sound or emission, it was a clear night i did observe a military jet traveling in the same direction about 2 minutes later. i wanted to get my phone to take a photo of it but was afraid i wouldn't have time to go back in the house and retrieve it in time.
content.summary: I was standing outside and was looking up and noticed a spherical light travel north it suddenly got brighter and then dimmed and turned into a dot and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, 3/11/15 at about 10:30pm on the 3rd floor of my
townhouse in south philly facing north (toward center city) exactly 2
miles away, i was putting my 3 year old son to bed. he was over my
shoulder looking out the window when he said, "what's that green one?"
lots of helicopters and airport traffic pass over our heads on the way to
the airport, and there's a helipad or two in the city so we're quite
accustomed to the aircraft in the area. this one was intriguingly
different. i stood by his window to watch for about 2 minutes. it wasn't
going away. it kept hovering east to west between city hall and the
comcast building between roughly 30 and 50 stories high, and it was a
green light. periodically it would float way up above the height of the
comcast building, then back down to continue hovering around the city
hall area. sometimes this behavior can be a news or police copter except
they blink, and have white and red lights. this wasn't wasn't blinking,
and periodically right before our eyes it would change from solid green
to solid red. also helicopters eventually land on a helipad or fly away
but this wasn't leaving. i put my son to bed and ran up to our 4th floor
deck, grabbed the binoculars and watched it for about 2 more minutes.
through the binoculars i could see clearly that it wasn't one light but
two lights side by side, almost like headlights, both solid green and
occasionally changing to red (or perhaps turning? perhaps two red lights
on one side and two green on the other?). again no blinking, just both
lights slowly changing color every 30 seconds or so. then right in front of my eyes it vanished; just suddenly blinked to darkness and was gone
(or at least turned its lights off). i wondered if it was someone's toy
drone but it seemed way too bright and and way too high for that.
wondering if anyone else saw or reported it. thanks.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering and moving pair of green lights (single craft) that would sometimes both become red. non-blinking. then suddenly vanished.

content.detailedDescription: In the western sky a bright orb was observed.  it appeared to be in a low orbit and did not change trajectory.  after 1 minute of observation the orb abruptly vanished.  the colors of the orb were blue and white with a hint of red.  these colors were part of a hazy aura.  the object was first thought to be a satellite until it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright orb in low orbit.  abruptly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
we were at the ghost town of "coolgardie" north of barstow, off copper city road. on a topo map it is called "mud hills " !!!
we were facing west towards the far east end of "edwards air force base !!!!
to the north it is the "deep space observation center, to the east it is "fort irwin army base " .
  we go out here to mine for gold, shoot guns ,and have a great desert dinner over the camp fire !!!!!!  we look at the galaxy too !!!
we had telescopes !!!!
  at about 8:15 pm "d" and i were looking towards the west "edwards".
we started to see the air force fly a "crazy" uav at the end of the east runway !!!!  we thought it was great !!! i was shooting by big f'n mouth off about "ufo"s !!!!  then after 20minutes it stopped !!!!
 after about ten minutes, now it is really dark .....
  this is when i got freaked out !!!!!
someone from the east started walking up hill towards us !!!! it seemed to be about 400 yards away !!!!
  no one walks up this road at night !!!!!
i got my "sks" out !!!! this is not right !!!!!!
this "person" got within 150 yards from us !!!! i yelled out.. id yourself"
may be in was someone in trouble or a medical thing !!!!
after i yelled out , the light went out !!!!
i was scared !!!!!!  i am thinking that someone is going to try to rob us !!
i was ready to shoot someone dead !!! you do not walk up in this desert and play this f'n game !!!!
 the next you i know is that a bright white sphere craft was at the base of 
"opal mountain" east side !!!!! there are no roads on this part of the mountain !!!!
  the white sphere was at the east base of opal mountain, we looked at it through the telescope !!!! within minutes, a red and green craft showed up !!
these crafts orbited around the white craft and would shoot off and return !!
  i was scared s**tless !!!!!!!!
after about 20 minutes of this, the air force sent in two choppers to check out the area !!!! when the choppers showed up the white, red , green craft took off !!!
when the choppers left the f'n crafts showed up again !!!!
  oh, now i am really scared !!!!

  my friend and i watched these crafts orbit and spin around the white colored mother ship !!!!
  i said two hours !!! no, it was four hours !!!!!!
i finale feel asleep with a "sks" in my hands sitting next to a fire that was only coals at this point !!
  i have never gone back to this place again !!! it scared me !!!

  the only reason that i write this e-mail is because, i was watching the history channel, hanger-1 !!!!
when i saw "barstow 2009" i just about threw-up !!!!
i thought me and "d" were the only people to see this !!!!!
i never thought other people or that you investigated this !!!!!!!!!!!

 me and "d" were never abducted !!!!!!!! nothing like this !!!
to tell you the truth, if they would of tried this i would of put 10 rounds of 7.62x39 into them !!!!!
  i had two other experiences of this s**t in 1987 in moorpark !!!!
i would shot what ever came up to me !!!!

  this is the most crazy part of the story !!!! i teach chemistry and astronomy at school !!!!  i use my telescope at least 12 hours a week !!!
i am not some crazy person !!!!  "d" was also a science teacher at the time !!!
  when you have astronomy teachers willing to use an sks, there are problems !!!!!!

  my friend "d" use to laugh at me when i talked about "ufo"s !!!
that day he kept playing the song "hey mr. spaceman " to me !!!!
 now that mf er knows better !!!!

 to answer your last question, "how did you loose sight of them" !!
i passed out from f'n stress !!!

  let me just say this again !!!!! i was f'n scared !!!!!!!!
i thought that they had me out there in the middle of the desert !!!
i have never gone back to that place again !!!!

 this should support your "barstow 2009" story !!!!!

 there were "people" close encounter of the 3rd kind, within 100 yards of me and my friend !!!! i almost gave them 10 rounds of 7.62 x 39 !!!

  you say not to use profanity !!!! i can not help it !!!
this scared me so bad, that you are luck that i

 only wrote it as i did !!!

  you want proof !!! follow me !!!!!
   [name removed/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking when i noticed something above. i first saw 4 objects together. then one left then the other. other two stayed stationary. slowly drifted east until out of sight. i have videos.

content.detailedDescription: As a child i was awakened in my bedroom by a small grey entity moving in circles. as i started to move i was paralyzed, and could not move. after approximately 30 seconds, the paralysis subsided, and the event became physical. i grabbed the entity, and bashed it about the room. after approximately 10 seconds the entity disappeared.
content.summary: Physical event with entity

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid when we seen this my father brother a friend and my self seen this from our back yard . we had went out with our dog and was just standing around talking it was a nice night clear with lots of stars . we seen what looked like an old car from the teens a open top touring car we could hear the motor run and to a point see the wheals turning. its head lights were on . it was moving very slow in a straight line our friends mother seen it as she was pulling into our drive way . i have never seen any thing reported about it but i want to know if any one has ever seen this to? the only bad thing is my father and friend are both dead so the only ones that can still say what we seen is my brother and i . do you have any other reports of this or have you ever seen it ? any help would be great.
content.summary: Car like

content.detailedDescription: In november 2012 i came home from work around 8pm ate dinner showered and watched some tv. i fell asleep with the tv and lights on about 9pm. i awoke sometime later around 11pm. upon waking up i realized that i could not move at all. i laid there on my left side facing the wall. behind me the the lamp was still on. when i looked at the wall i noticed that a shadow was being cast on the wall. it was then i became frightened because i couldn't move even a little. no matter how hard i tried i couldn't turn over. the shadow remained there for about 20 seconds then moved away from me. i didn't hear any sound within the room at all or hear the door open. it was only then i was able to move again. in a panic i flipped over and swung my legs off the edge of the bed. out of breath i looked around the room and there was nothing there. out of the corner of my eye i saw a flash of light outside my bedroom window which i also thought was strange because that window didn't face the street and the house was set back about 200ft from the road. i got off the bed and ran outside to see where the light came from. first i looked around the yard to see if there was anyone out there then i looked at the sky. there was nothing. the next day at work i noticed that my right arm was itchy, but when i scratched it i noticed there was something in my arm. about the size of a grain of rice. there is no scar where this object is and i know it was not there prior to this. it remains in my arm to this day. i will take a polygraph test anytime anywhere to what i experienced. also, for the past 3 years i have been wanting to know what this object in my arm is and find out once and for all what it is. if you can help me with that or maybe give me some info i would really appreciate it.
content.summary: I believe that i was abducted and implanted with a foreign body
